Match mating is the issue here, its not alot of fun being throwen up against Uber pro Leit players since day one type against lvl1 noob me, match after match after match...until that one Noob killer comes along then finally you can win for a change unfairly again, Match Making, Matching making, Ranked Matches, why are these simple concepts thrown to the way side? in hopes yoll frustrate me enough to spend money to lvl up o there "lvl" with all maxed out perks? nope.. Ooh no...not a chance....this game is like a roulette wheel of fun where some times you have fun but most of the time you dont..yeah yeah yeah yeah unless you play as the killer is ALWAYS fun to play as the killer in this game, did i mention match making? oh yeah thats right ranked matches are a thing and match making would be nice to even and balance out the match making it a batter match made experience, consistence and fun to be matched up and made to be on the same lvl as your opponent. Match Making.
Ay Unos Sustos Me Pege xD

I really want to give a positive review for this game but I can't until they fix this busted matchmaking in this game. Every single game playing as the killer I would just get matched with people with the highest rank while I'm just sitting here at the lowest rank in the game. It's just so frustrating with no way to learn from your mistakes because they all finish before you even get a single person down. I really wanted to enjoy this game but I'll only play this for custom games with friends until this game's broken matchmaking system is fixed.

Para quem é iniciante e que vai começar a jogar esse jogo, recomendo você jogar bastante com assassinos e sobreviventes, não joguem só com sobreviventes, por que você não vai entender direito as skills dos assassinos e os tempos de recargas deles, é essencial tentar decorar o mapa também e lembrar aonde que ficam geradores,pallets, ferramentas e caixa de curativos.

 Uma dica importante que percebi também, evitem de jogar com grupo de amigos, joguem na fila individual mesmo para você aprender, porém pode chamar um amigo para jogar sim, para fazerem call e fazer um grande planejamento.
 
Sobre os upgrades é com o tempo que você upa, depende das quantidades de partidas que você irá jogar, cada personagem tem o seu estilo de skill seja assassino ou sobrevivente.
  
Infelizmente só consegui jogar uma vez de assassino por que a fila demora um pouco, dai para ser mais rápido só jogo de sobreviventes, mas tá errado que estou fazendo, vou precisar ser mais paciente e jogar com as duas classes.
  
Esse jogo para mim é para se divertir não é para ser levado a sério, não me importo com o nível do ranking, por que pelo que percebi o sistema de ranking desse jogo é falho, quando comecei a jogar  esse mês do nada o nível do meu rank estava no nível 6, eu sou ruim nesse jogo e não merecia estar nesse nível.
Matchmaking is broken as hell and the game crashes half the time. The game relies on people wanting to be killer but baby killers are ranked against much higher ranks

Игра с уникальным геймплеем. Наиграл 500+ часов и могу её рекомендовать. В игре есть много проблем но эмоции, которые подарила эта игра перекрывают все баги и проблемы баланса. Покупать стоит на скидке, так как они довольно частые!
Топовая игрушка для повеселиться и попотеть с друзьями. Соотношение цены и качества более чем отличное.
Almost as anxiety inducing as tapping your pocket and thinking you lost your phone

Esta muy, pero muy mal balanceado, no hay equilibrio entre jugadores y los supervivientes siempre tienen desventaja en todo, porquería solo saca rabias.
XD
scarry and fun te caci pe tine de ras sau de frica
Sta fachedo

El juego esta bien, solamente que si quieres jugarlo, prepara tus mejores armas porque te vas a enfrentar a Deidades, seres mitologicos o directamente dioses que no obstante con lo rotos que estan los killer, tiene la grandiosa idea de meterle perks que los hacen equiparables a las mas poderosas entidades que solo la mente de estos desarolladores pudieron imaginar. El juego te dice que la muerte no es una salida, creo que lo deben cambiar puesto que la salida es solo un objetivo alcanzable cuando el killer es muy novato (y hay veces que ni así se puede salir, porque estan rotos) o cuando simplemete quiere ser amable y te deja la trampilla o está AFK. PERO si tu equipo es muy bueno y logra hacer los generadores, reza para que el killer no tenga NOED, Porque los desarolladores pensaron que es muy facil para los survivors escapar entonces se los vamos a poner más dificil, cosa que solo pensaron ellod y los que juegan solamente de killers. Asco de juego, balanceos peor que el LOL, matchmaking horrible, jugadores asqueroso que utilizan ese desbalance a su favor y tener a deidades como enemigos, pero adictivo.

the part that i disliked was that the leap of the killers is way too big,when a survivor is fast vaulting through a window or pallet,they get caught by the killer or his weapon,everything else was good
A mayor tiempo jugando se vuelve relativamente más fácil, un paso a la vez, es divertido.
top irmao

el juego en si es muy bueno actualmente hablando desde la perspectiva de un novato si quieres comprar el juego te recomendaria que estes atento a los foros por si revierten o cambian el sistema de emparejamiento especialmente si te interesa el rol de asesino ya que siendo yo de rango bajo me tocan partidas en contra de veteranos de rango maximo desde que se implemento este sistema 8/10 de mis partidas son encontra de veteranos los cuales simplemente me aniquilan, se burlan durante la partida haciendo que el juego sea de todo menos  disfrutable, al jugar superviviente la experiencia es igual un asesino de rango mucho mayor el cual simplemente nos aniquila a todos antes de que podamos hacer 1 objetivo. En resumen no compres el juego hasta que cambien el sistema a algo mas sano  con los nuevos jugadores y los jugadores casuales. 

actualizando la reseña sigue igual pero ahora hay problemas con los servidores que causan problemas con las hitboxes, se caen los servidores a media partida, problemas con las animaciones y de latencia.

Game is full of toxic players, mostly your fellow Survivor(s). Do yourself a favor and find another game in the genre to play.

EDIT: Another thing is the game breaks after every update and I need to verify the integrity of the game cache to MAYBE get it to work again.
EDIT 2: The above is still happening no matter what I try, I even deleted the folder that was the source of the issue, verified, and boom a day later a patch comes that fucks it up YET again. Essentially the EAC for this game is broken.
EDIT 3: Game still sucks, still experience the same problems, rewriting/downloading the whole game, long ass queues, games that never load, etc...

I've played this game pretty much since its come out and the devs never cease to amaze me at how every patch they seem to make the game worse and worse. Each update creates a new issue and makes the game incredibly not fun. The devs dont listen to the survivor community AT ALL and put in updates that make no sense. Play this game at your own risk, not bcus the players are toxic but because the devs will never make the game viable and fun to play.

If ya like this kind of game, then you'll probably like it, but if you dont like this kind of game, then you probably wont like it. I havent decided whether I like it or not because I'm not sure if I like this kind of game. Will update later once I've finished the opening cinematic. 

Update: the opening seemed long and there was zero gameplay, but it did instill some hope of me liking it. Now I'm not sure what to do. It's telling me about new content, which is cool to people streetwise to this game, but I do not know what the old content is? Perhaps, they should add an old content feature for the people who havent played before so no one is left behind. 

Update 2: I give up on this game. I got past the new content level, but now I'm stuck on the level select archives thing. It seems to be placed here as some sort of red herring. No matter how many times I get deja vu from clicking the level, it will not go into the level "prologue." Im no detective but my hunch is its dlc. WHAT WERE THE DEVS THINKING????" IM JUST TRYING TO PLAY THE CAMPAIGN BEFORE HOPPING INTO MP BUT SHODDY CRAFTSMENSHIP WOMT LET ME OR GREEDY DEVS TRYING TO UP THE ANTE OR SAVE THE BEST FOR LAST. NO THANKS, ILL JUST GO PLAY DYING LIGHT. THANKS FOR THE OVERCHARGE ON YOUR CHEAP GAME.

Update 3: Make your choice whether you like or dislike this game. I, personally, feel bamboozled. If you wanna talk me into liking this game with your dark devotion to a monstrous shrine of dlc, I'm all ears and ready to face you head on, but just wake up and smell the bbq and chili.

Dbd è un gioco che (apparte qualche glitch o bug grafico) non presenta imperfezioni... Il gameplay in sé è fatto molto bene poiché è degno di far parte della categoria "horror", unisce insieme anche diversi film, come "non aprite quella porta"; "Halloween";"Scary movie" e molti atri classici del genere horror. E in più ha sistema infallibile che individua i modder. Negli ultimi tempi sta diventato un gioco molto popolare (è uscita anche una versione per mobile) ed è diventata popolare pure sui social, come twitch; youtube... io personalmente ho conosciuto il gioco grazie a Zeb89 (prima youtuber ma ora streamer sulla piattaforma twitch) e grazie ai suoi gameplay mi sono appassionato allo stesso. Io ne consiglio l'acquisto!
recomendado al 100 por ciento muy buen juego especial para todo momento competitivo, divertido, buenos asesinos y supervivientes.
